last_episode_to_air.name: Carmic Behavior
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Faith realizes she never learned how to drive, she takes lessons from her mother, Cricket, but during her first time behind the wheel, she almost runs over former flame, Dan  in the crosswalk -- a fateful meeting that could reunite the two. Meanwhile, Faith's driving adventure prompts Cynthia to track down an old school classmate.

name: Leap of Faith
overview: Leap of Faith is a half-hour single-camera comedy that aired on NBC in early 2002, right after Friends on NBC's Thursday comedy block at 8:30 PM EST, as part of Must See TV. One of the highest rated shows to be cancelled, the series ended after just six episodes, despite ranking 12th for the season and having an average of 16.5 million viewers per episode.
